info.author: Atsuo Ishimoto
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
pykf --- Japanese character encoding converter
==============================================

pykf is Japanese character encodings(ShiftJIS, JIS, EUC-JP) converter
for Python. See readme.sjis for detail.

Installing
==========

run "python setup.py install".

Copyright
=========

Japanese Kanji filter module

PERFORMANCE OF THIS SOFTWARE. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------
This module is besed on kf.c written by Haruhiko Okumura.
    Copyright (c) 1995-2000 Haruhiko Okumura

Original kf.c:
    http://www.matsusaka-u.ac.jp/~okumura/kf.html
